comment.author: 31794493@N00
comment._content: Anyone know which corner this is? Perhaps the northeast corner of Alaska and MLK? Or would it be SE? Probably not the W side because you don't see Beacon Hill in the background. If the location is Alaska and Empire (MLK) it's not really Beacon Hill -- it's in the Valley.

comment.author: 32573662@N00
comment._content: Based on the county's 1936 aerial photos of that intersection, you were right to think NE. You can go over to iMAP, hit Property Search, and enter parcel 6056110020; at the bottom of the Layers frame, expand Imagery and select 1936 B/W Aerial Photos. Sadly I can't figure out any way to link to a specific parcel in iMAP, much less select active layers.

comment.author: 31794493@N00
comment._content: Wow. I didn't realize we had 1936 aerial photos of the area. Thanks!
